alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 9:29AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A developing thunderstorm will impact portions of Essex, northeastern Suffolk and east central Middlesex Counties through 1030 AM EDT... At 928 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a developing thunderstorm over Middleton, or near North Andover, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Broad rotation was noted with this storm and may produce funnel clouds. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lynn, Lawrence, Haverhill, Malden, Medford, Revere, Peabody, Methuen, Salem, Beverly, Woburn, Andover, Lexington, Tewksbury, North Andover, Melrose, Saugus, Danvers, Wakefield, and Reading. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Southeast Middlesex; Suffolk; Western Essex
